items.name: Wide Flared Arm Sofa
items.description: If you were a couple, the extra space on the couch is for someone else or your pet. A beautiful upholstered fabric finish and exposed wood base and legs create a natural finish for your room.

items.name: Wide Square Arm Sofa
items.description: Bring designer style to your living room with the upholstered loveseat. A beautiful upholstered fabric finish and exposed wood base and legs create a natural finish for your room.

items.name: Round Arm Loveseat
items.description: Classic loveseat upholstered in hand-picked soft linen fabric, with a traditional yet sleek look. This loveseat is guaranteed to make your living room look comfortable and cozy.

items.name: Linen Flared Arm Sofa
items.description: This upholstered sofa, which has a simple, magnificent, and stylish appearance design. It can offer comfortable support, and it is a comfortable partner that inspires your work.

items.name: Carles of London Sofa
items.description: This sofa is an ideal choice for any living room. This traditional sofa set features beige polyester upholstery, diamond tufted backrest, English-style arms, and is beautiful.

items.name: Ulises Loveseat
items.description: Not one to be outshone when it comes to both comfort and aesthetics, this mid-century modern 2-seater sofa will most certainly give anybody's current arrangement a run for its money.

items.name: Sofa & Chaise
items.description: Enjoy cozy family movie nights and host classy cocktail parties alike all at this stylish sectional. The perfect centerpiece for your seating arrangement, it blends contemporary appeal with simple sophistication.

items.name: Faux Leather Sofa
items.description: This convertible sofa is made of high-quality material, sturdy and durable and ensures a long life span. The legs are made of premium iron, and the sofa bed is tested before sales for safety.

items.name: Liam 76" Wide Sofa
items.description: Get the perfect blend of contemporary chic and timeless elegance with this upholstered sofa from George Oliver. Designed to fit effortlessly into compact spaces to bring style and comfort to any room in your home.

items.name: Rolled Arm Sofa
items.description: Luxurious leather upholstery highlights this collection. This Leather Loveseat features hardwood construction and brass-colored nail-head trims. The perfect centerpiece for your seating arrangement.

items.name: Speakman Arm Sofa
items.description: This sofa evokes Hollywood glamour with a modern style and lush velvet upholstery. The silver nailhead trim finish shows it's sophisticated side. this piece will command center stage in a living room or master suite.

items.name: Feinstein Velvet 67.6
items.description: Beautifully styled and consciously crafted using materials, makes a welcome addition to any living space. The soft velvet fabric. upholstery imparts timeless style, with high-density foam.
